proof_register.title: Internet and Daily Work Activation Under Inverter Limitation
End-of-Day Gate Closure for Home–Farm Zone Separation

constraints: Solar power system runtime constraint (not continuous 24-hour operation)

constraints_and_notes: CID/JSON metadata retrieval was not possible today; deferred for later processing.
Energy limitation impacted completion of all planned daily data operations.
next_actions_deferred: Create CID/JSON files after metadata becomes accessible.
Continue primary dataset processing and complete remaining OTS items when energy availability allows.
